TopicTitle: Super Colonization On Hold While I Update To 1.1

Articles.Content: Just thought I'd let you know that Super Colonization is not dead, but on hold until I get the files sorted out and stuff. 1.1 means that a lot of the mods that I use are broken/incompatible until the mod makers update them. Which means much messing with ModuleManager scripts. Which means it'll be a while...
